document_data.name: Destructive Wave
document_data.mainbody: '''''Destructive wave''''' (also seen as '''''destructive smite''''') was a [[spell]] used by [[paladin]]s.
document_data.Effects: After the spell was cast, the caster struck the ground with their fist, generating a brilliant wave of divine energy that swelled outward. Any creatures within 30 feet (9 meters) of the caster were knocked over by this wave and suffered divine and necrotic damage.
document_data.Components: This spell required only a [[Verbal component|verbal]] component.
